el_GR {
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u0394\u03C1\u03C7",
            "GRD",
            ",",
    }
    LocaleString { "el_GR" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "GRC" }
}
